data.eml:eml: Note on authorship and lectotypification of Scutellaria glechomoides (Lamiaceae) from Iran

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Massoud Ranjbar, Chonour Mahmoudi, Laurent Gautier (2014): Note on authorship and lectotypification of Scutellaria glechomoides (Lamiaceae) from Iran. Phytotaxa 188 (5): 296-298, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/phytotaxa.188.5.9
